DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined types to define the particular type of the spatial zone. There may be property set definitions available for each predefined type.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcSpatialZoneType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcSpatialZoneTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcSpatialZoneTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no spatial zone type object associated, then the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcSpatialZoneType_.
